languages.text: "Игрушку? Речь о творении еретиков, что стала вместилищем варп-твари, орудии уничтожения и скверны! {name}..." {n}Хейнрикс задыхается от гнева.{/n}
"Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix is briefly choked with fury.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Игрушку? Речь о творении еретиков, что стала вместилищем варп-твари, орудии уничтожения и скверны! {name}..." {n}Хейнрикс задыхается от гнева.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix's fury causes him to lose his breath.{/n}
"Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix's fury causes him to lose his breath.{/n}

"Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix is briefly choked with fury.{/n}

languages.text: « Votre "jouet" ? Cette machine a été construite par des hérétiques pour accueillir une abomination du Warp. Ce n'est rien de plus qu'un instrument de destruction et de corruption ! {name}... » {n}Heinrix est pris d'une telle colère qu'il en perd brièvement la parole.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix is briefly choked with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Votre "jouet" ? Cette machine a été construite par des hérétiques pour accueillir une abomination du Warp. Ce n'est rien de plus qu'un instrument de destruction et de corruption ! {name}... » {n}Heinrix est pris d'une telle colère qu'il en perd brièvement la parole.{/n}

languages.text: "Euer 'Spielzeug'? Es wurde von Ketzern gebaut, um als Hülle eines Warp-Monsters zu dienen, als Instrument der Zerstörung und Verderbnis! {name} ..." {n}Heinrix' Stimme überschlägt sich vor Zorn.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix is briefly choked with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Euer 'Spielzeug'? Es wurde von Ketzern gebaut, um als Hülle eines Warp-Monsters zu dienen, als Instrument der Zerstörung und Verderbnis! {name} ..." {n}Heinrix' Stimme überschlägt sich vor Zorn.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Su "juguete"? ¡Era una creación hereje, el receptáculo de una abominación de la disformidad, portadora de destrucción y corrupción! {name}...». {n}A Heinrix se le atraganta la furia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix is briefly choked with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Su "juguete"? ¡Era una creación hereje, el receptáculo de una abominación de la disformidad, portadora de destrucción y corrupción! {name}...». {n}A Heinrix se le atraganta la furia.{/n}

languages.text: 「『玩具』だと？それは忌まわしい歪みの器として異教徒たちが作った、破壊と堕落の道具だ！{name}さん…」{n}一瞬、怒りでハインリックスの呼吸が詰まる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix is briefly choked with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「『玩具』だと？それは忌まわしい歪みの器として異教徒たちが作った、破壊と堕落の道具だ！{name}さん…」{n}一瞬、怒りでハインリックスの呼吸が詰まる。{/n}

languages.text: “你的‘玩具’？它是异端分子制造的亚空间怪物！是散播腐化与毁灭的工具！{name}……”{n}海因里希怒不可遏，一时不知说什么好。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix is briefly choked with fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你的‘玩具’？它是异端分子制造的亚空间怪物！是散播腐化与毁灭的工具！{name}……”{n}海因里希怒不可遏，一时不知说什么好。{/n}

languages.text: "Oyuncağın mı? Kâfirler tarafından bir uçsuz garabeti, yıkım ve yozlaşma aleti olmak üzere üretilmiş bir şey bu! {name}..." {n}Heinrix, bir anlığına öfkeye boğuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your 'toy'? It was built by heretics to become a vessel for an abomination of the warp, an instrument of destruction and corruption! {name}..." {n}Heinrix is briefly choked with fury.{/n}
